title: E-Commerce Platform Testing
description: Comprehensive test automation framework for an e-commerce platform using Selenium and Java. Implemented end-to-end testing for checkout flow, payment processing, and inventory management.

title: API Testing Suite
description: RESTful API testing framework using REST Assured and Postman. Created comprehensive test coverage for authentication, data validation, and error handling scenarios.

title: Mobile App Testing
description: Mobile application testing using Appium for both iOS and Android platforms. Developed test scripts for user registration, login, and core feature validation.

title: Performance Testing Framework
description: Load and performance testing framework using JMeter and Gatling. Designed test scenarios for high-traffic scenarios and analyzed system performance under stress.
